Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Terrific neighborhood cafe, the kind we love to stumble across. Excellent food. Their tripel - brewed just for them - was one of the best I've had. The daily special - an Indian beef dish with green beans, rice and a marinated egg - was delicious. My wife's satay was also excellent.

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Had the chicken skewers and bitterballen. They were good, but I enjoyed the other restaurants. The restaurant isn't very handicap friendly. Most of the dining area is up or down stairs and getting to the restroom is impossible if you're handicapped.

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Great place- very relaxed; feels like a bar, yet serves top quality food with great service. I was able to do some work on my laptop while enjoying a glass of wine and having a perfectly cooked pork tenderloin. One thing that was annoying were the fruit flies flying around, but I guess it's the season for them..

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: The food is amazing. The service is exactly what you would expect. The beer is cold and the view is awesome. It's not overcrowded which makes it a gem.

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text:
A good joint for a chin wag and beer.

The rising noise of the bar on Friday night was a testament to its friendly …

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Great restaurant excellent food and service ,great atmosphere prices are $$.. recommended

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: I wish London had places like this. If it were in London it would be rammed and you wouldn't be able to hear yourself think but here it was no problem getting a table and super relaxing. Great decor with split level feature at back. …

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Lovely bar/cafe in the heart of De Pijp. It was quite crowded when I went on a Wednesday evening around 8:30, and seems to be a popular spot for locals from what I can tell (I was visiting from out of the country). …

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Cider was unbelievably cheap, atmosphere was amazing and the staff were brilliant. Lovely little location, we sat outside and it was just gorgeous. Wouldn’t change a thing about this place it was such an excellent place to come for a drink.

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Scammed by the bartender, asked for shots and bartender told us "we just give you random shots", and turns out he gave us the most expensive one

Name: Gambrinus

Name: Gambrinus

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Gambrinus was one of our favorite places to visit (and revisit, twice) over our week-long stay in Amsterdam. Wonderful beers, great sandwiches, and reasonably priced. When we return, we'll absolutely be going there again.

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: My favorite bar in De Pijp! Great beers, big windows and a friendly staff. It gets packed after 7pm which makes for good people watching.

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Don't be fooled by the brown bar exterior. This place has a beautifully decorated two story seating area, a nice selection of sandwiches and lovely coffee.

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Delicious toasted sandwich and warm soup to shelter from the chill outside. Cheery welcoming staff; popular with locals as well as tourists.

Name: Gambrinus
Review Text: Food was some of the nicest my girlfriend and I had ever tasted. Really nice, cosy atmosphere and the staff were lovely.
